arts.ttl: Reims predicted XI v Monaco: Teddy Teuma to start
arts.sum: Teddy Teuma, who has been in and out of the Stade de Reims starting line-up since Luka Elsner’s arrival in the summer, is set to start and captain Les Stadistes as they…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Reims: Radoslaw Majecki and Denis Zakaria out
arts.sum: AS Monaco are without three key first-teamers as they head to take on Stade de Reims. Denis Zakaria remains absent with a minor hamstring injury, although he could return next…

arts.ttl: Radoslaw Majecki absent for Monaco after playing through adductor issue against Arsenal
arts.sum: Radoslaw Majecki’s (25) heroics, coupled with Arsenal’s profligacy kept AS Monaco in their UEFA Champions League tie, against the Gunners, at the Emirates on Wednesday evening. However, he did so…

arts.ttl: AS Monaco looking to dip into the market to recruit a striker following Folarin Balogun injury
arts.sum: AS Monaco currently have just two strikers at their disposal: Breel Embolo and George Ilenikhena. That is after Folarin Balogun, who returned from a dislocated shoulder at the end of…

A 0-0 draw with Strasbourg means Reims have won only one of their last seven. They haven't the best record at home, but have proven a tough nut to crack. Monaco fell to a 3-0 loss at Arsenal in midwe...
